Quickstride prepares to move out with Rattrap and Straight Shot on his back=
.  The tiny porcupine narrows her optics and raises her quills in readiness=
 to fight.  

" We'll have ta worry about Uproar later.  Right now we got b=
igger problems ta solve.  And when I see that poor excuse for a Prime I'm g=
onna let him have it!   And I don't care if it takes every quill on my body=
!  Rodimus dissed us one time too many and I'm not about ta take his scrap =
any more!"

Rattrap nods.

"You got that right, Prickles.  Same here, if I =
could take that miserable hot rod apart tire by tire I would!  Humph!  And =
don't expect me ta take any orders from him ever again!  "

Quickstride nar=
rows his brow.  

"I hate ta admit this guys but they have a point.  After =
what Rodimus pulled I'll be surprised if the council allows him to keep the=
 Matrix of leadership.  I seriously hope he's not allowed back as a Prime. =
 If anything, he better be stripped of that title until he really smartens =
up and does something about that dark side of his.  I know Leo Prime will d=
o the right thing, and I definitely know Tucson Prime will not stand for Ho=
t Rod's unacceptable conduct.  Ohh I hate ta see what would happen when tho=
se two meet face ta face again.  We've seen Tucson when he's angry, he's li=
ke a tempest when he's in the worst of his moods.  And now, yikes, look out=
.  Dragons are notorious for extremely dangerous tempers.  Well, that's if =
ya rub the scales the wrong way.  Other than that, we need his strength and=
 he's got plenty of that.  Plus, he's been extremely generous, understandin=
g, protective, and very sincere about our well being.  Look what he did for=
 Silverbolt, he risked his life to save him and now hopefully he'll pull th=
rough.  I can see why Nightshift, Straight Shot, Talon and Rattrap have so =
much faith in him.  He will do anything for us and it's time we did somethi=
ng for him.  C'mon!  Let's do this!  FOR TUCSON!"

Rattrap and Straight Sho=
t both raise their paws.  

". FOR TUCSON!"

Perpetually on the move and co=
nstantly busy. 

On Oct 20, 2011, at 12:22 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonu=
s@...> wrote:

> On 10/19/11, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wr=
ote:
> > Uproar looks to Airhammer and Bantor with a droopy expression. It =
was clear
> > that the virus was taking a small step further as he drags hi=
s paws along
> > the ground while heading back into the ship.
> >
> > " May=
be- it's not such a bad idea ta stay back after- all.
> >
> > He takes one =
more step and then collapses.
> >
> > Straight Shot gasps as she watches hi=
m go down.
> >
> > " I knew it, he should've listened ta Stanton and Bump a=
nd stayed where he
> > was."
> >
> > Quickstride looks back to his fallen c=
omrade.
> >
> > " The only one who knows how ta cure him is Tarantulus. Ugh=
h, the thought
> > of even going anywhere near that twisted spider makes my=
 metal crawl. But
> > if that's the only option we have then I'm willing ta=
 go find him myself and
> > ask for his assistance. Then I imagine I will h=
ave to return the favor
> > somehow... "
> >
> > A tickle from his nostrils=
 and a healthy snort clears his nose.
> >
> > " That's better. I just got o=
ver a small case of something myself. Funny,
> > I've been sneezing quite a=
 bit too but I wasn't dispersing any energon..
> > Hey, the only guy I've b=
een around is Uproar, so I know I got this from him.
> > But for some reaso=
n, I shook it off."
> >
> > Rattrap raises a brow.
> >
> > " Wait, wait, I'=
ve read up on something about horses, something about the
> > fact that the=
y have someth'n in their immune systems that have the ability
> > ta neutra=
lize a whole bunch of harmful toxins, just through their blood
> > serum. T=
hat's how anti venom is made, in case a person or animal gets
> > tagged by=
 a venomous creature. I bet Quickstride's got that capability,
> > just tes=
t his hemoglobin for antibodies. If he fought off that virus, it'll
> > be =
in his blood work."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> BANTOR shook his head, "I don't know mu=
ch about those things." He said
> as he looked between RAT TRAP, QUICKSTRID=
E and UPROAR. "Santon, Bump
> and Legacy were the doctors last I saw." He s=
aid with a shrug.
> 
> "Something to think about though." AIRHAMMER said as=
 he looked back at
> the trio, "Rhinox would have tried the same thing and =
it didn't work
> for him, why would it be different now?"
> 
> LEO PRIME, W=
ING CALIBER, SANTON and TORCA were still standing near the
> center of the =
area occassionally glancing at HYDRAS and SKYSHADOW or
> talking amongst th=
emselves.
> 
> Judging by his stance and body language LEO seemed definitel=
y ready to go.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

      <p>On 10/19/11, Sandy Panico <<a href=3D"mailto:magicquartz%40yah=
oo.com"><a href=3D"mailto:magicquartz@...">magicquartz@...</a><=
/a>> wrote:<br>

expression.  It was clear<br>
> that the virus was taking a small step f=
urther as he drags his paws along<br>
> the ground while heading back in=
to the ship.<br>
><br>
> " Maybe- it's not such a bad idea ta stay ba=
ck after- all.<br>
><br>
> He takes one more step and then collapses.=
<br>
><br>
> Straight Shot  gasps as she watches him go down.<br>
&gt=
;<br>
> " I knew it, he should've listened ta Stanton and Bump and staye=
d where he<br>
> was."<br>
><br>
> Quickstride looks back to his f=
allen comrade.<br>
><br>
> " The only one who knows how ta cure him i=
s Tarantulus.  Ughh, the thought<br>
> of even going anywhere near that =
twisted spider makes my metal crawl.  But<br>
> if that's the only optio=
n we have then I'm willing ta go find him myself and<br>
> ask for his a=
ssistance.  Then I imagine I will have to return the favor<br>
> somehow=
... "<br>
><br>
> A tickle from his nostrils and a healthy snort clea=
rs his nose.<br>
><br>
> " That's better.   I just got over a small c=
ase of something myself.  Funny,<br>
> I've been sneezing quite a bit to=
o but I wasn't dispersing any energon..<br>
> Hey, the only guy I've bee=
n around is Uproar, so I know I got this from him.<br>
>  But for some r=
eason, I shook it off."<br>
><br>
> Rattrap raises a brow.<br>
><b=
r>
> " Wait, wait, I've read up on something about horses, something abo=
ut the<br>
> fact that they have someth'n in their immune systems that h=
ave the ability<br>
> ta neutralize a whole bunch of harmful toxins, jus=
t through their blood<br>
> serum.   That's how anti venom is made, in c=
ase a person or animal gets<br>

Quickstride's got that capability,<br>
> just test his hemoglobin for an=
tibodies.  If he fought off that virus, it'll<br>
> be in his blood work=
."<br>

<NEW><br>
<br>
BANTOR shook his head, "I don't know much =
about those things." He said<br>
as he looked between RAT TRAP, QUICKSTRIDE=
 and UPROAR. "Santon, Bump<br>
and Legacy were the doctors last I saw." He =
said with a shrug.<br>
<br>
"Something to think about though." AIRHAMMER sa=
id as he looked back at<br>
the trio, "Rhinox would have tried the same thi=
ng and it didn't work<br>
for him, why would it be different now?"<br>
<br>=

LEO PRIME, WING CALIBER, SANTON and TORCA were still standing near the<br>=

center of the area occassionally glancing at HYDRAS and SKYSHADOW or<br>
t=
alking amongst themselves.<br>
<br>
Judging by his stance and body language=
 LEO seemed definitely ready to go.<br>
